author: miohtama
content: At the moment I am not aware of a way to query logs in a robust paginated manner

author: miohtama
content: A wrote a web3.py example to use throttling to query all logs for a certain events here https://web3py.readthedocs.io/en/latest/examples.html#advanced-example-fetching-all-token-transfer-events

author: miohtama
content: If you find anything better please let me know

author: miohtama
content: Here is also one GoEthereum issue that might be a bit related https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/issues/20426
